website_summaries.verdict: Fits deep mattresses especially well, as its elastic works on 22-inch thick mattresses. Does not affect the comfort of your mattress.
pros: Delivers a hypoallergenic cotton terry fabric that will give you a comfortable surface throughout your night of sleep
Extremely thin sheet, which means the fabric is breathable
Uses elastic around the entire edge of the sheet to give you a tight fit on the mattress
cons: May make you feel hot as you sleep on it
Creates noise as you move around on it

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: NOT WATERPROOF. I bought this 10 months ago for my two year old’s double mattress. This morning he woke up quite wet. His diaper leaked. I was shocked to find it went right through this mattress protector! I had read other comments before buying, someone said they poured water on it to check it’s waterproof claim, and they had no problem. I’m guessing if you leave the water on it, it will eventually seep through because it didn’t protect my son’s mattress. Do not buy if you really need waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's like sleeping in an oven
customer_reviews.text: This thing is like sleeping in an oven! I have never had night sweats before, and ever since I put this on my mattress, I have been having night sweats every night! I wake up multiple times a night dripping in sweat, even when taking my comforter off AND using a fan blowing on me. It's awful. I never would've purchased if I had known it would be like this.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: ... mattress pad out of the packaging that it was good quality and would pass the waterproof test
customer_reviews.text: I could tell when I took the mattress pad out of the packaging that it was good quality and would pass the waterproof test. It's soft on the top and has a waterproof layer on the other side. I layed the pad over a cup and poured water over it and it held the water without seeping through. Very happy with the mattress pad and will be confident that this will protect from any night time accidents my toddler may have.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Survives cat pee and stomach flu.
customer_reviews.text: I have a latex mattress I'm trying to protect. With several cats who sometimes pee on the bed, being waterproof but breathable was a necessity. I've had the mattress pad for over 3 months, and it has done a wonderful job keeping the cat pee from getting to the mattress. Just recently the mattress pad showed just how good it is. I came down with a really bad case of stomach flu out both ends. I trashed the mattress pad afterwards...but it did its job. Nothing made it through to the mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Kalynnda Rivermoon

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly protects against my toddler!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought TWO of these because I've been so pleased! First, although I haven't done the "spill a whole cup of water" test, this is used on my 3 year old's bed - which means it has passed the test of pee, poop, vomit, leaky water bottles, etc. and lots of it! And what I was mainly looking for was the depth of the mattress protector. It's a think mattress plus a memory foam - I'd say about 15 inches. Do you know HOW hard it is to find a protector (and sheets!) that are that deep for a XL twin?! This has PLENTY of depth! Bonus: it was an awesome price! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Azmtnmama

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Now that i have had this mattress protector for months I feel I can expand on my review with more knowledge of the product. This mattress protector is a MUST-HAVE! I purchased new mattresses and because we have a dog and 3 children (this was for each bed) accidents can and DO happen. After many washes and dryer cycles the product still holds up beautifully! No wear on the elastic at all. These are a great save for when we have had accidents (whether nighttime bedwetting/dog pee/or drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Disario

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully on a memory foam mattress
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to cover a Zinus Sleep Master Ultima Comfort Memory Foam Mattress, also sold on Amazon. Both of these are in our RV. The cover slipped over both the Zinus mattress and the underlying mattress of the RV. with plenty of room to spare. The cover kept the foam mattress from heat transfer and also from any "chemical" odor that might have been present. Being waterproof, it also kept the foam mattress from absorbing night sweats or other moisture related activities. It was easily washed and I air dried it. Definitely does what we need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: NOT urine-proof or waterproof
customer_reviews.text: If you’re buying this for someone who wets the bed, choose something else. I bought three of these and found out the hard way that they let urine through. Foam topper ruined. Mattress ruined. Try poly sheeting from the hardware store instead, because at least plastic actually is waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly! Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the queen size protector for our Lucid 10 inch memory foam bed. Fits perfectly. Arrived as promised, clean, packaged nicely. No problem with slipping. Quiet. When putting this on the mattress there is a crinkly side and a textured soft material side. The crinkly side faces down against the mattress .The cover fits the mattress and them some. It extends underneath the mattress about an inch and a half snuggly. It does not make any sound. Its quiet as others have described. I would buy again. Not sure about the waterproof part yet, as there have been no spills or accidents. Not anticipating any, but you never know. :)
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: So far it's excellent.
customer_reviews.text: My cat hasn't wet it yet which is why I bought it, so I can't speak to that issue.... but I definitely like the item. NO SMELL AT ALL! YAY!! Very easy to put on the queen size mattress, no pulling or tugging or broken nails trying to put it one. It really fit perfectly. Does not make noise when you move on it. Conclusion is: very comfortable and happy with the fabric. If my cat wets it and the mattress cover does not prevent the liquid from reaching the mattress, I will update my review, but so far I give it 5 stars. BTW, nicely packaged and arrived as promised. The price can't be beat!!!
customer_reviews.author: savvy buyer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy if you are easily awakened by noises.
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have washed it once with no issues. The top is terry cloth material with a flexible plastic coating underneath. The sides are a mesh material. It fits my mattress and pad nicely. It doesnt slip off, it could be a bit tighter though. I like that it is supposed to protect my bed and pad from any liquids. However, no liquids have been spilt, and I'd rather not test it. It does make a lot of noise compared to non-waterproof mattress protectors. It is not loud enough to keep me awake at night though.
customer_reviews.author: Miran S.

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress protector-protected from Cat Urine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress protector months ago and just recently had it put to the test. My husband accidentally left the cat in our guest bedroom for a day, so naturally the cat peed on the bedding which went through all the layers. I was happy to find that the mattress protector kept the liquid on the surface and did not allow any urine to go through. I personally threw mine away after that but this was worth not having my mattress ruined due to a lack of attention on our part. Buying a new one to put back on there!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlie K

customer_reviews.title: A definite necessity, especially with pets or kids-
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, soft, does not make any sound when moving around and has the nice stretchy elastic skirt all the way around to accommodate very thick, pillow top type mattresses etc. This will NOT add any additional height to your mattress/bed if your concerned in that area. Also, it will NOT add any thickness meaning to soften your mattress and add comfort like a topper or anything. This literally is as thin as a towel and the texture is like a baby's bib, soft thin terry cloth-like. But it's waterproof like advertised, and will fit under sheets without interfering with anything, perfect!
customer_reviews.author: elle

customer_reviews.title: Great matress protected.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I spilled a cup of coffee on this and it did not go though to the mattress. It was easy to throw into the washer and dryer. It does a great job. I can’t feel it under the sheet. It fits my 16 inch mattress with room to spare. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Joan S.

customer_reviews.title: BEST mattress protector ever!
customer_reviews.text: I don't write reviews often, but this was exceptional. My son got sick and ended up in bed with us. Shortly after he woke up and puked alllll over our bed and brand new mattress. I was certain our expensive mattress was ruined, but once we stripped the bed, NOTHING had gotten through this mattress protector. Nothing. This is the only protector I will ever buy again! We already bought a second one to have on hand. I originally bought both the terry top and the smooth top to see which one we liked better. The terry top felt thin and scratchy so we stuck with the smooth top and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Welchzorbz

customer_reviews.title: I they are the best. No crunchy noise and 100% waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a few mattress protector before I decided to get this one based on the raving reviews. I first bought 1 to test, I they are the best. No crunchy noise and 100% waterproof. I wish I had saw these before. That would have saved my mattresses from a lot of stains, most of which are urine. I bought two more of these for my other rooms, because I would rather buy a good protector than prevent my kids freedom.
customer_reviews.author: K H

customer_reviews.title: Important but dislike it
customer_reviews.text: I know how necessary this is when you are using a memory foam topper, any sweat will get trapped in the foam and become a playground for microbes and mold but I hate the way it feels! It makes a “swishy” noise is when you shift around, and takes away from the softness is the gel topper. It’s also hot as heck!! We wound up buying a quilted mattress cover to put on top of this which solved our issues with the feel/sound but that’s just one more layer between us and the gel memory foam. Meh.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Not crinkly....and it works!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this waterproof mattress pad for a child's queen sized bed. It has been a great barrier that hasn't allowed any "accidents " to reach the mattress. What a lifesaver. The mattress is a thinner one (not of the pillow top variety) and the pad fits great. It is not crinkly and it makes no noise when laying in bed on top of it. When our other child moves into a queen sized bed, we will buy this same item again!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: 5⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my husbands excessive night sweats. Can’t feel or hear it at all. True to size fits well. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old is struggling with potty training during the night. Some nights he does great and others he wakes up soaked. I bought this mattress pad out of desperation. He was ruining his mattress! Since using it he has had plenty of accidents but his mattress has stayed dry! It's quiet and fits over a standard mattress. The only negative is that it has to be line dried. I wish I had bought a back up to use while the one is drying!
customer_reviews.author: Lez McC

customer_reviews.title: Noisy and Not Soft
customer_reviews.text: This cover is not noise-free as advertised -- I can definitely hear it crinkle when one of us moves on the mattress. Also, the terry cloth top is not soft at all -- I ended-up covering the protector with a softer cover I already had that is not waterproof. I should have stayed with a cover I previously purchased, but I thought I would try this one based on it's reviews. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This product is just great!! I have three of them; they are easy to wash, fit the mattress perfectly, and the price is unbeatable. Check out the prices of a protector even close to this ones quality in Walmart and other stores; they begin pricing at over twenty dollars and sjky rocket even higher. It is cool to sleep on even when the weather is hot and humid; does not cause you to perspire while sleeping. Highly recommend this to anyone searching for a good mattress protector, you will not regret purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: RJK

customer_reviews.title: Works, until it doesn't
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on August 27, 2016 from LinenSpa. I thought it was the greatest purchase ever. I have a baby, toddler and husband that frequent drinks coffee on our bed (why?). It worked well, as long as you pulled it off the bed within a few minutes, until this past month, now it does not work at all. Two wet mattresses later, argh...
customer_reviews.author: steph

customer_reviews.title: Yes! It’s really waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress cover! Let me just start off by saying I have another cover on my mattress more permanently. It’s fully enclosed (zipped) but I needed something I could removed easily and was washable. This mattress cover is AWESOME! It’s cloth material makes it so the sheets and bedding stays on(no more sheets coming off). They say it waterproof....I say it completely grown man pee proofed! My 14 year old son has Autism and has accidents from time to time. When he goes it’s a full flash flood. But now with this mattress cover it’s absorbed into the terry cloth and nothing seeps through. I’m really happy with this find!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best night potty training investment
customer_reviews.text: Saved our twins mattresses during those potty training accidents. Cleans up great in the washer, holds tight through the jumping on the bed sessions & has a nice fit for deep mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica U

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect to use while potty training
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to use while potty training. It really does protect the mattress from getting wet. The material does feel like a towel but this sheet goes under the fitted sheet so you don't even notice it. ** In the picture you will send that the protective sheet soaked up my son's juice.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha M

customer_reviews.title: i like that this isn't a full mattress cover
customer_reviews.text: i like that this isn't a full mattress cover. making it super easy to take off the bed and wash if need be. ive had other bed protectors and they're all too nosy and break after awhile. but not this one this one is 100 percent quiet and withstands my 3 year old jumping up and down on the bed. ive had a couple spills on this mattress from chocolate milk and the protector absorbed the milk and kept the mattress clean. no leak through what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: We love this. We just got a new mattress and ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this. We just got a new mattress and this is the best mattress cover I've ever had! Update: This mattress cover has saved our mattress THREE times, since we put it on. We have a little one who tends to crawl into bed with us and after three "accidents" our mattress is still completely dry! For cleanup you just throw it in the wash on cold/hot (NO bleach) and put it on low when it hits the dryer. After being washed several times it is retaining it's shape and not stretching, and still extremely comfortable to sleep on. Did I mention I love this?
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: The reason I got this mattress protector is because my child sometimes has an accident. It provides the mattress quiet protection. The cotton cover draws moisture away. It was very easy to put on to my mattress and comfortable to sleep on. No more ruined mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Ling

customer_reviews.title: Great protector
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress protector. I purchased a few of these over the years for different family members and they don't need to be replaced for many years. I love that this holds up well with hot heat in the dryer, otherwise it would take a long time to dry. Another brand in this price range disintegrated in the dryer, so I am a happy repeat customer of this Lucid item.
customer_reviews.author: sugarsugar

customer_reviews.title: Long term review.  XXL owner.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress functioned well for the first year. I am six feet five inches tall, and 400 lbs. I loved this mattress for the first year, then it became flattened where the majority of weight is concentrated. I did thorough research of this mattress before making the purchase. Though it did very well, I'm disappointed in the items longevity. My fiance's side of the bed has endured well and she is less than half my weight. If you are an average person, this mattress is for you. If you are large, then please, continue shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jungquist

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mattress protection
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the money. Works perfectly as a protector for the mattress. I also use a regular non-waterproof mattress cover over the waterproof cover so its only purpose is to prevent moisture from reaching the top of the mattress. It stands up well to continuous use and occasional laundering. And the mattress remains like new. No noise from the waterproof plastic. Is soft and pliable. The top surface feels like a fabric and is comfortable. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: KAD

customer_reviews.title: Great value and durable!
customer_reviews.text: These work great for the price! I have a super thick mattress and my puppy has ruined mattresses before by peeing on them or having an accident, so I bought them for every bed in my house once I replied all my mattresses and they work amazing! You can throw them in the wash and clean them, bleach them and put them in the drier and they don’t shrink at all. I even bought them for my parents beds as well. Fits under sheets and doesn’t make the sheets come off the mattress either. Everything stays put and it doesn’t make any noise.
customer_reviews.author: sarahB

customer_reviews.title: Noticeably dirty, DON’T buy this hairy thing!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to arrive at the same time as a new bed. Haven’t been able to use the protector yet because I’ll have to wash it, probably a few times. From when I took it out of the box, there were immediately black specs and lint visible through the plastic bag. Then finally once going to open it, I found the hair wound into the fabric. Really disgusting and disappointing. I’ve bought from Linenspa / Lucid before but haven’t had an experience like this. Seems like I got someone else’s return or some trash like that. Even more aggravating because I don’t have time to return this and get another. Really not freaking cool.
customer_reviews.author: Joe L

customer_reviews.title: Changes the feel of your mattess
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this protector because it changed the feel of my mattress. I bought a very nice mattress with that feels amazing, but I only noticed this when my mattress protector was in the wash. I have to give up my mattress because of a move and missed out on really experiencing all that I paid so much for because of the protector. If you have a really nice pillow-top or foam mattress pass on this protector for something that won't change the feel of your mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof - The other reviews were true!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this waterproof mattress cover in August 2017. I washed it just once in cold water and let it air dry. I did NOT dry this in direct sunlight nor near any high temperature surfaces. Therefore, I know that my wash and care of this product did not have any negative effect on the advertised performance of this product. My child vomited water on this mattress ONCE and the vomit seeped all the way through the 'waterproof' mattress cover and onto my $700+ mattress. This cover is not waterproof and it should not be advertised as such. I will be contacting the seller for a refund immediately. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: JKim2012

customer_reviews.title: Best protector ever
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical with some of the reviews, but I took a chance because I love this brand. My memory foam mattress was from the same creator. My cat likes to pee on the bed sometimes and when we went on vacation we came back and she peeded all over the bed! Luckily it never made it to the mattress! I have had this for two months now, and it's still standing strong!
customer_reviews.author: Breeanna

customer_reviews.title: Great cover, comfortable and soft.
customer_reviews.text: Mattress cover is very easy to put on and has extra deep pockets - my mattress is 12 inches high and I had no issues getting the cover on. It hasn't moved or slipped an inch. Super soft, helps hold my fitted sheet in place. And the best part? No plastic crinkle sounds when you shift around or heavy plastic smell! I haven't had any spills yet so I cannot speak to its waterproof claims.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Protects the bed but difficult sometimes to wash and dry.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be waterproof. It is light and thin, easier to wash frequently. It has held up to monthly washings for a year thus far. Only glitch is due to it’s plastic backing it doesn’t spin well often. It comes out of the washer very wet requiring hand wringing before going into the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: teacher

customer_reviews.title: Makes no noise! Protects well and has lots of matterial to securerly hug even a super thik mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought one years ago I had a slight mildew smell after coming back from vaca and since it cannot get the odder out I needed to hide it until I can get a new bed. THIS mattress cover did the trick! THANK YOU also it doesnt make any noise when I roll over or what not, this was a big concern for me.
customer_reviews.author: nezo311

customer_reviews.title: Hotter than normal.
customer_reviews.text: The pillow fits fine. It is nice and soft, but its keeps heat more than just a regular pillow case. It's not a big problem, people should know.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for mattress protection.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mattress cover. Be aware that this isn't a "pad" in the sense that it adds any softness of thickness. It's only meant to protect the mattress from soiling or liquid spills. It's got a thin terry-cloth like fabric on it, but the entire mattress pad is very thin. If you need something to add softness or bulk to your mattress, you'll need to choose a different type. I'm sure this one will keep my mattress clean. It went around my entire mattress very easily. (Like a fitted sheet.)
customer_reviews.author: cybernurse

customer_reviews.title: Zippers Broke
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these for my kids pillows. The material is good quality overall. No crinkly plastic sound and pretty comfortable to sleep on with a pillow case over them. However, the zippers broke on all 4....they pull apart so the pillows are not zipped up or they just don’t zip at all, and without zipping closed, they tend to come off of the pillows. They are machine washable and do protect the pillows from wetness and body oils, I just wish the zipper quality was better.
customer_reviews.author: Baker

customer_reviews.title: Fits a 16" mattress perfectly - not crunchy or bunchy
customer_reviews.text: Feels nice and perfectly fit the 16" Lucid mattress we bought it for. Mattress didn't work for us, so we filed a return, but we're keeping this cover for our son's bed. Feels just like the $90 cover we bought for our Sealy latex mattress several years ago. Snug waterproof protection without being crunchy or bunchy. I recommend washing it before using it for the first time. Those who complained about it being crunchy must have used it straight out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Petunia

customer_reviews.title: standard, good price
customer_reviews.text: It's a good deal and I actually bought this for the mattress of the same brand, Lucid 3" latex on foam base (10" total) that I LOVE. It fits nicely, but does not envelope the mattress. It fits like a fitted sheet. I am just glad that I put a memory foam topper on it because of the noise factor. Any waterproof mattress cover will make the same scratchy, crunchy sound when moving on it, unless you put a topper on and your fitted sheet over all of it.
customer_reviews.author: Webb

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I can get another year out of my mattress by using this topper! I've been using the memory foam topper for a month and my back is happy! Gone is the pillow from underneath my legs. At this time I am extremely satisfied with my purchase. I put it on my bad hours after letting it "rise'. I purchased a waterproof sheet since I have a preschooler and infant frequently napping on my bed.
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought about 8 mattresses in 7 years because I need to move out constantly for work. From the most expensive to the cheap ones.. this is just the best. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Protection
customer_reviews.text: We have issues with a cat that occasionally decides to pee on the bed (though, in fairness, it's usually because we forgot to scoop the box). For a while we had a protector that we paid about $100 for from the place we bought the mattress. The old protector tore to shreds in the dryer even though it said it could be dried. This one is as good as you could want, especially for the money. We've had this about 5 months, and the cat has sought revenge twice in that time. Both times the urine has not gotten into the mattress, and a rigorous wash and dry posed no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Feels & Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have pets...a bunny and two senior dogs, they jump on the bed from time to time. I was looking for some type of waterproof (pool proof) protective covering for my new Lucid mattress. This is lightweight, soft yet durable. The terry-cloth surface is attractive, not at all crunchy. Surprised me. It also fits snuggly, no extra fabric that bunches up. It's offered at a great price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TeriFLA

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: .The quality of these covers is very good & they are very soft. My only problem is that they are way too large & I have to fold the end a lot to keep it from protruding out of my pillow cases.Would need to order one size smaller than your pillow.
customer_reviews.author: peggiepop

customer_reviews.title: It protected our memory foam bed fom CAT PEE attack!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to protect our new memory foam bed and we know it works because Barbara got upset and peed on the bed because I was giving Helen a revolution flea treatment. When I heard Barbara meowing I immediately ran into our bedroom to make sure she wasn't on the bed and to spray feliway all around, but she had already peed. I treated the spot then carefully peeled each layer up until I reached the linenspa mattress protector and the pee did NOT leak through! I washed it according to the directions and line dried it outside then put it in dryer for 10 on low and it still perfect. It washed well and we are super happy!
customer_reviews.author: VIVIAN X

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress protector. I have two for smaller beds and one for our queen bed so far. I wash them every week or more often and they have been holding up for a year now with no rips. They absorb most any liquid that leaks on it and doesn't let it get to the mattress. It isn't soft but it doesn't matter to me, I put a regular sheet overtop anyway and you can't feel it once the other sheet is on.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: The best for kids!!! NO LEAKS!!! NONE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only mattress pad/protector I will be using for children for the rest of my life! Urine does not get through! Nor did fecal matter or the associated odor get through! Washes well. I haven't dried them using the drier yet. Instead I hang up. Usually air dries is about 24 hours (so I'm very thankful I bought back up ones for my children who are not potty trained yet). Not the most comfy, cozy mattress pad ever, but that can be mitegated by blankets.
customer_reviews.author: BR Lathrop

customer_reviews.title: Overall helpful product
customer_reviews.text: Dad is on high dose diuretics, These have been a life safer / clothing saver! He was reluctant at first to wear them. We had a different brand for the first trial. This brand it much better, the size is more comfortable around his waist and legs. They provide relief from wetting himself all the time.
customer_reviews.author: donna rae fisher

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I got this to prevent any accidents occurring on my memory foam bed. I have a cat with constant UTI issues. It did not keep the urine from my mattress. It is not as waterproof as advertised. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cadédath

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover was offered at a good price; however, it does have a bit of that "crinkly" feel when you roll over. I think I'm missing a bit of the softness of my mattress with this cover over it, but I like the protection it offers.
customer_reviews.author: Coral Ann

customer_reviews.title: Don't really notice it's on.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for protecting the top of you have a hot sleeper, this can help resist mold and such growing on your mattress. So that alone makes it worth while. However there is no protection on the sides as it is purely mesh. It's also not noisy which is a plus as well. And doesn't change the feel of the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT quality, fit my full size memory foam mattress ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bed since my autistic 6 year old seems to climb in my bed at night about once a month and have an accident. EXCELLENT quality, fit my full size memory foam mattress perfectly. The fitted sheet like lining fits extra snug, and it's the first waterproof cover I've found that doesn't feel/sound like laying on plastic. Would definitely recommend, very pleased. **UPDATE** Its been over 4 years since I purchased this (also have one for my son's twin size bed), and they're both going strong. Have gone through the delicate wash cycle maybe a handful of times and have not shown any wear.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Lynnnn

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend to every friends
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It was affordable and did its job of protectIng my mattress. I would totally recommend to my friend. I was little worried before that waterproof part would make noise and cause discomfort but I can't notice that Cuz one side is waterproofed and the other (one that gets on my back side) is clothed like shower towel. I put this mattress cover and put the bed sheet on top and it is perfect!! No noise, and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My grandmother asked me to purchase this for her so that my grandpa that has dementia and also incontinent could use this for his mattress. This product is NOT WATERPROOF AT WHATSOEVER . This was a waste of her money and my time ordering. The mattress was just as wet with the mattress topper as it was before we ever bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Proffit

customer_reviews.title: Must Have For Not Housetrained Doggies
customer_reviews.text: I've had this since November and it has worked out great. I recently rescued a dog who unfortunately for me thinks it's okay to pee on the mattress sometimes, and when she does this thing is a god send. It's never let a single drop seep through and my mattress looks as flawless as the day I got it. I've washed it four times and never had any issues as far as the quality deteriorating. It's not plasticy feeling at all and makes no noise, it really feels like it's not even there once the sheets are on. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on comments and review and was hoping it would protect my brand new mattress but it failed miserably. Dont buy this is u want a waterproof cover becuase it isnt. They need to update there advertising and remove waterproof so people dont waste their money and get a ruined mattress. I dont recommend buying this cover if u want a real waterproof mattress cover becuase this isnt.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Christina G.

customer_reviews.title: Best Investment for Your Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Mattresses are expensive. But stains are unavoidable. You cannot simply put a mattress through the washer. With this mattress cover, you won't have to worry about stains. Simply remove the mattress cover, spray Resolve stain remover on the spots. Then put in the washer (I do cold wash for everything), then put in the dryer (low setting). Works great when my daughter has her period. None of it gets on the mattress. This mattress cover protects from period blood stains and the like. But like all other fabrics, wash the mattress cover as soon as possible to make sure the stain comes off.
customer_reviews.author: riasupermomma

customer_reviews.title: Pillow protector
customer_reviews.text: Item as described! Works great protecting pillows from pet accidents or blanket storage. I found I need to let air out before laying on it otherwise have to wait for it to seep out. Quiet material, no crinkle sound!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this it really helps not get any kind of ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this it really helps not get any kind of stains on my mattress and I love how it's machine washable. I had a situation where my apartment was covered in water from a leak on the second floor and my mattress was not wet at all from the sheet. The sheet is a lifesaver without it I would've had to buy a new mattress from the leakage. No damage to my bed whatsoever! Would so recommend and I will be repurchasing this in the future whenever I need a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Britnie

customer_reviews.title: Envelope design kept my mattress spotless with  But hard to remove and put on
customer_reviews.text: Good and Bad Envelope design kept my mattress spotless with dogs and bed head coffee spills Bad Envelope design is very difficult to take off and put on. Need strong friends one who is a masseur
customer_reviews.author: meb

customer_reviews.title: Foam mattress pad, fit great with it
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a foam mattress pad, 3 inches. I was trying to find a waterproof mattress cover that could also fit with my pad in the bed. I tried this one out, and it all fit perfectly, I am so relieved and happy! Now to buy deep pocket sheets!
customer_reviews.author: Pippi

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: This came a little later than expected, however I am satisfied with the product. Not only did it fit my bed perfectly, it was easy to put on, which is half the battle when it comes to these things. Also it was fluffy and soft on the top instead of sticky and plastic like most similar products. I am happy to report that it doesn't crinkle or slide around in the evening. I will update my review if I ever experience a "wet" incident. I am going to buy this in twin sized, for another mattress,
customer_reviews.author: Jaynie

customer_reviews.title: Nice protector but not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This product seems very high-quality and like it would work well for most people but it was just too much like having a plastic cover on my nice latex mattress... I do not like the sound it makes more in the way it lessens the feel of the nice mattress. The top is a nice terry fabric that is very soft but the bottom is a water barrier that is very reminiscent of a plastic sheet for a child's bed and I could not deal with that. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Spitzhacke33

customer_reviews.title: Only waterproof on the top.
customer_reviews.text: It is only waterproof on the top. The sides are just mesh. So my foster dog peed on the corner edge of the bed and that side of the mattress is now full of urine. Unfortunately the rewash able doggy pad I also had on the bed was no longer waterproof. So a double failure ruined my mattress. Have soaked that area with enzyme spray and will have to go over it a few times. Now it's time to look for a waterproof protector that is waterproof on the sides, also.
customer_reviews.author: Moo

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchase!j
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived timely, and was packaged nicely. It fits the bed and seems to fit the bill. I needed waterproof because we have an elderly little Yorkie that sleeps with us. I like this mattress cover very much. I haven’t laundered it yet and I hope it will not effect it. It a better quality than I expected. I only wish that all bed and mattress linens would say Top and Bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Graber

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress protector! This is the second one I've bought, the first one I got a few years ago and it's still going strong (other than a few small holes). The ones I would get at Walmart for about the same price would last maybe a couple months and had that plastic-y feel to it, but this one has a nice clothy feel and very durable - especially for such a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Traci E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed Protector!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this two years ago for our queen size bed. Has kept our mattress looking brand new. We wash in the machine and hang dry. Protects against accidental menstrual cycle leaks, spills from drinks or food. Just wash and go. Our sheets never slide off the mattress with this protector. It extends well underneath for perfect coverage. Ordering two more for the kids beds.
customer_reviews.author: Shelina is Platinum!

customer_reviews.title: Too noisy
customer_reviews.text: For me this is unusable. I put it on my new mattress, laid on it, and promptly took it off. It just makes too much noise when you lay on it and move around. It would have driven me crazy. That dreaded crinkling noise.. I'll just have to take my chances without it. The top-side cloth material is very rough and of poor quality. Not worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: ... have a king size one on my bed and love it! So I got another for my 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a king size one on my bed and love it! So I got another for my 2 year old son as he sometimes sets the bed, it does good job protecting the mattress. The only thing I would recommend is to take it off within 30 min of your child wetting the bed otherwise it will leak on to the mattress. I guess it’s easy for me because my son wakes me up as soon as he pees in bed so I change it right away.
customer_reviews.author: kristina.bat

customer_reviews.title: Good protector
customer_reviews.text: Nice item to have, especially if you tend to sweat in bed. It seems a little like plastic on the inside (tarp-like) and has a suade type or fuzzy fabric outside. It goes pretty unnoticed when in place. Mine got a little hole at the edge after a I checked it a few months in which may be from stretching over my mattress and topper. It does come with a warranty but I figured it's not a big enough problem to spend effort getting a replacement (and am not sure if this would be covered). Would give 5 stars if no hole was found.
customer_reviews.author: Techie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Protection Against Steamy Spouses
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my husband is a human space heater at night and sweats like a fiend. I didn't want our new memory foam mattress to soak all that up, so we bought this. Some of the reviews said it was noisy- the first night it had a bit of a rustle, but there's not much sound to it now at all. It also stays on our 16" mattress without popping off of the corners (which is a huge plus for me). I'd definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cover for sleepers and seniors who may have accidents
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cover for sleepers and seniors who may have accidents. Not a problem anymore. No Noise, crinkling, and so on. Been sleeping on this for 1 week now, what a wonderful nights sleep on this new cover. I use an occasional heating pad, i was worried it might melt but no such problem occurred. The terry cloth cover is such a supreme delight.
customer_reviews.author: PMS

customer_reviews.title: Protect the bed at all costs!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this in King for my bed and Queen for all three of my kids beds. I wanted something that was durable and would protect the mattress from any liquids. We have a dog that likes to snuggle on the beds with us and she has a habit of happy piddles. This helps SO MUCH! Plus, my daughters like to have drinks with them when they do their homework on the bed... even though they have a perfectly good desk to use... ahhhh teenagers. There have been a few accidents and this product has held up. Wash cold and dry on delicate has been my regimen to keeping these bed protectors in top notch
customer_reviews.author: ParkerFun

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a year ago today and I have to say it's the best cover I have ever purchased. Not only does it stay on, but it is good quality, fits perfectly as well. I wash it on the cold and let it air dry. No more stains on my mattress from my kiddos sippy cups leaking :D Just purchased a twin bed and I'll be buying another for the new mattress
customer_reviews.author: Shokra

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver. We just purchased our first brand new bed and wanted to protect it from our little minion so it didn't void the warranty. We got this right in time! Our son madw a big pee puddle in our bed and I didn't find it until about 7 hours later.... NOTHING soaked threw and I am so happy with this product!!! And does not slip off of our bed like sheets do. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: robin goetz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Very soft material, I look forward to many years of use from this mattress protector. I bought it for my granddaughter who is transitioning from a crib to a bigger bed.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Works but hang dry only
customer_reviews.text: Did the job when we were all sick with tummy bugs . Puke, pee, poop it keeps it all away from your bed like a champ! Being sick is no fun but having this makes it a little less stressful especially if you bed is memory foam and you've got small kids. The only pain is hang drying because it's not supposed to go in the dryer ..
customer_reviews.author: Amanda H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered three of these. I use one for myself with another mattress topper over it. But I also use it as the only cover for a foam mattress I use for my guest room, which gets a lot of use. The guests love it! Everybody comments on how comfortable terrycloth beneath the sheets feels. Because it's waterproof, that mattress will stay fresh and new for longer and the terrycloth topping to the product makes it even better. And it seems like it's made very well so I will be ordering more of them in the future. Great purchase. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Eric C

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I tested the sheets before putting it on my bed just to be sure it would protect my mattress. I put it under running water and yes the top layer absorbed all the water and did NOT let it seep through. I am so happy to have a product that is actually waterproof and not just water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Happygirllexy

customer_reviews.title: URINE PROOF
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my kitty keeps having accidents on my bed. Lo and behold, the night I put it on, the night he peed on my bed again. I lifted it off my mattress and it was completely dry underneath. This IS urine proof. **HOWEVER, I did catch him in the act and was able to tear off the cover almost immediately. I've seen other reviews stating that it eventually seeps through if you don't catch it in time. I cannot speak on this experience, but I can confirm if you catch it quick enough, it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: washed up well and is very comfortable. Thank goodness I had my new mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: Works just as expected and I feel confident that it will protect my mattress. One day after putting on my bed, my pug decided to "let go" on the entire bed. Had never done it before or since, but there I was with a really big, not even a puddle, because he went to town, all over my brand new mattress. This held up, washed up well and is very comfortable. Thank goodness I had my new mattress pad. Disaster adverted.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Richter

customer_reviews.title: This waterproof protector works!
customer_reviews.text: This waterproof protector works! My wife put our child down for a nap on the bed today. He soaked through his diaper, through the comforter and sheets, but it did not penetrate the protector. This one time has earned my money back considering how cheap it costs. I was hoping I would never have to test if it works, but rest assured that it does. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: J. Stinedurf

customer_reviews.title: A real problem solver!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a nearly 17 yr old 5 lb Chihuahua that sleeps in our bed at night under the covers. She is blind and deaf. 98 percent of the time she asks to be put down to go to the bathroom. Until I got this mattress cover if she had an accident it went through the sheet into the gel pad topper on our mattress. This cover stopped that totally. I've machine washed it with no problem. It's soft and makes no noise.
customer_reviews.author: Debi McG

customer_reviews.title: Bean Bag Cover
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to act as a cover for my Sumo bean bag chair. I've heard horror stories of cats using Sumos as their litter box, and my cats LOVE the Sumo, so I just wanted some insurance. They still love to sleep on the bean bag, which is good for them. This is easy to throw in the washer/dryer so that's good for me. If I want to sit on the Sumo, honestly it's fine to just sit on the cover, but it's more comfy to take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Thode

customer_reviews.title: Sleeps Hot
customer_reviews.text: This thing catches water or liquids very well. I actually didn't return it because now it's my go to cloth if I need to lay something down when I'm worried about leakage. For a mattress though the problem was how noticeable this was. Full disclosure I have a purple mattress with Sheex sheets - meaning I sleep cool, it's like a smooth silky experience every night. This mattress protector couldn't hide itself there. Noticeably hotter, less airflow, I could even hear the plasticky crunch. Again if you're on a hotter bed or have thicker sheets maybe you won't notice but this exposed it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Mattress Cover
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised to the softness, quality, and the fitting of this mattress cover. My former one would never be wrinkle-free but this one fits so smoothly. I am very well pleased and would recommend it. My son had recommended it to me and he is a particular person.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son’s mattress. The company suggests covering the memory foam mattress with this cover. The price on Amazon was better than the other websites. It’s worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: mo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my sons accidents
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My son has accidents and I’ve washed this multiples of times. It’s held up. I always check to see if it’s went through on the mattress but nothing has happened yet.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great value.
customer_reviews.text: I am not a cotton terry fun for pillow protectors but as I am using them in children beds in a vacation rental this was the best way to go and they serve excellently their purpose and you could never guess they have that waterproof protection as you cannot feel their polyurethane backing at all. Also, their warranty time couldn't be better! Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Good Inexpensive Mattress Cover
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mattress cover for a spare bed. We have an older cat that occasionally has accidents, so we wanted to protect the mattress. This cover worked for ~10 washes and was no longer waterproof. The urine soaked through and stained the mattress... It's a good cover if you don't plan on washing it tons.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Smells like a chemical bath even after being washed :(
customer_reviews.text: I can only repeat the very clear title: the product smells like a chemical bath even after being washed. Something is not natural nor right if you consider sleeping on a mattress cover that reeks of toxic material... after being run through the washer. I hope retailers consider banning this product or at least the materials used in them.
customer_reviews.author: h&m

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping good.
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I wanted to protect my new mattress. My cat Lola is getting old and had a accident on the last matress while I was away. We both are sleeping great on the new matress with a peace of mind.🌝
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: I bought 1 more :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself as a replacement for an old cover that kept making annoying noises every time you moved on the bed and would dislodge itself from place and move the bed sheets. I love this mattress cover; it does not move or make annoying noises, it doesn't get hot at night (for me at least), easy to wash and clean, material feels good and sturdy. A few months later after purchase, I ordered a second one for my parents because they needed a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.G

customer_reviews.title: Changes feel of mattress
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to test the water resistance or cleaning part of this protector, but there is room for improvement from a comfort standpoint. This mattress protector is not quiet and completely changes the feeling of my mattress. It isn't unbearable but it definitely makes my mattress feel like there is a fairly thick layer of plastic on top. I bought this to see if it would help with dust issues I was having, but at this point I'm not sure its worth the drop in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

product_meta.title: LUCID Protector, Queen
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Style:Cotton Terry TopSoft, quiet protection this soft, quiet mattress protector is made from quiet, ultra-thin material that is breathable and maintains a comfortable sleeping temperature. The LUCID mattress protector has a cozy Terry fabric top surface that does not change the feel or sound of the mattress while providing excellent top-of-mattress protection against liquids, dust mites and allergens. 100 percent waterproof barrier a thin, quiet polyurethane membrane repels liquids and fluids to protect your mattress and your mattress warranty from stains. Made of safe materials, this protector is safe for children and pets. This liquid-proof barrier has tiny pores that allow air to pass for breathability and a comfortable sleep temperature. Do away with dust mites every night your body sheds millions of skin flakes and loses up to one liter of body fluid through your pores and mouth. Because they survive on dead skin cells and bodily fluids, up to 2 million dust mites can live in your unprotected mattress. Exposure to dust mites has been linked to the development of asthma in young children. Additionally, dust mites have been shown to be a leading cause of allergies and eczema. LUCID mattress protectors cut off the food supply to dust mites, making it impossible for them to survive. Deep pocket design fitted sheet-style mattress protector has a fully-elasticized skirt and deep pockets that keeps the protector tightly in place on mattresses depths up to 22 inches. Easy to put on and take off for laundering, this protector works great on extra-thick memory foam and pillow top mattresses. Machine washable keep your mattress clean and fresh by washing your sleep surface. Machine wash hot water. Tumble dry low. Do not bleach, iron or dry clean.
feature_bullets: 100% Waterproof - repels all liquids including bodily fluids, perspiration, urine and accidental spills - machine washable protection
Noiseless and comfortable hypoallergenic cotton terry surface and polyurethane backing inhibits allergy-causing dust mites and bacteria from living in your mattress - safe for children and pets
Fully-elasticized fitted sheet style with deep pockets designed to fit mattresses up to 22 inches deep
Ultra-Thin design is breathable, quiet and sleeps cool without changing the feel of your mattress
Queen size protector measures 60 x 80; 15-year warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars5,945 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
